name: Space Horizon
description:
2145 - The Corvid race of aliens have swept the Galaxy, leaving nothing behind.
It is up to you to put a stop to this villainous hive of aliens and restore peace back to the Galaxy!

However, you are not alone. With your ship the Space Horizon, you can conquer any foe that crosses your path!

Controls-
  • Move- W, A, S, D
  • Shoot- Mouse 1 (Left-click)
  • Shoot Rockets- Mouse 2 (Right-click)
  • Laser Beam- Press E  (when the Blue Bar is full)
  • Dash - Spacebar

All code, art and music were done by Thomas Peet (a.k.a me)

Special thanks to EmsArtwork for artistic help and common sense.
